DOC.brief_summary: Specific Aims: 1) Measure exhalation enthalpy in patients receiving conventional positive pressure ventilation during stable hemodynamic conditions. 2) Measure exhalation enthalpy in patients following change from two-lung ventilation to one-lung ventilation while minute ventilation remains constant.
DOC.criteria: Scheduled for elective surgical procedures requiring one lung ventilation. Age <18 years. Pregnancy. Prisoners. Planned pneumoperitoneum.
